items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 380 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 77!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 98)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 99!

items.checkin_comment: Not getting as much as the jalapeno as I would have expected.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 370 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 75!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 250 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 51!

Some beer runs are so momentous they deserve their own special holiday. National Independent Beer Run Day on July 3 is dedicated to celebrating independent beer for Independence Day. Outside, grillside, or poolside, be sure to stock your cooler with independent craft beer. Find a local brewery near you to grab a pint that makes an impact!
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 300 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 61!

items.checkin_comment: A smooth and toasty beer with a slight hint of coffee.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 97)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 98!

It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 180 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 37. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
Load up those hops, watch the IBU grow and drink it down! Now you’re all hopped up. The more bitter, the better. That's 35 different beers with an IBU of 65 or higher. Try 5 more for Level 8!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 160 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 33! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment: Cheers to the last weekend. This is a great beer with a nice barrel flavor that isn't overpowering

items.badge_name: Beyond a Shadow of a Stout (Level 12)
items.badge_description: We all love Stouts, and now we have a dedicated badge to celebrate your dedication to these dark, top-fermented beer in multiple variations, like Oatmeal, Milk and more! Which one will you start with? That's 60 different beers with the style of Stout. Try 5 more for Level 13!

items.checkin_comment: Firkin w/ vanilla bean. Adds a touch of sweetness from the vanilla.

items.badge_description: If you only had one wish, we bet it would be to enjoy at least 10 beers from your Wish List in a 60 day period.

items.checkin_comment: Nice and smooth. Great nitro stout

items.badge_description: Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 95 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more for Level 20!

Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 3 years on Untappd!

items.checkin_comment: Nice and refreshing on a hot summer day in SC

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 96)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 97!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 160 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 33!

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 35 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 8!

Put down those cases of Ale Yeast because unlike the IPA, the IPL is brewed with Lager Yeast and a generous amount of hops. When you want a punch of hops with a lighter finish, reach for an India Pale Lager. That's 5 different beers with the style of Lager - IPL (India Pale Lager). Try 5 more or Level 2!

Each time your neighborhood brewery pours a pint, it makes an impact on your hometown. Local beer is better like that. Don’t have a good beer, have a better one. Find a local brewery near you to grab a pint that makes an impact where you live. Because local beer is better.
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 105 distinct venues!

You have a keen taste for this Belgian masterpiece. Did you know the Saison style beer was invented by Belgian farms, brewed in the Winter and served the Spring/Summer to all their workers? Well now you do! That’s 30 different Saisons, Grisettes or Farmhouse Ales! Try 5 more for Level 7.
Axes at the ready? Sharpen your axe and take aim. When you're done, it's time to share a beer.

items.checkin_comment: Picked this up because I'm a fan of tea. I'm getting some green tea on the nose, but picking up more tropical hop flavors in the taste. 3.8 rounding up
